meanings.definition: A functional group consisting of a carbon atom double-bonded to an oxygen atom and single-bonded to a hydroxyl group.
meanings.sent1: In organic chemistry, carboxyls play a crucial role in forming acids.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the structure of carboxyls to understand chemical reactions better.
meanings.sent3: The carboxyls in the molecule were having a party with the hydroxyl group.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like carboxyls, connecting different concepts in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful models to explain the concept of carboxyls to the students.
